title: FS T206 Larry Doyle with Bat (SC 350/30 back) VG *Reduced*

posts.post_title: FS T206 Larry Doyle with Bat (SC 350/30 back) VG *Reduced*
posts.post_content:
Selling a nicely focused raw copy of Larry Doyle with Bat. No creases and nice surface; edge wear on right as pictured, some paper loss on back-top layer only. Seems it was big-bordered before the natural wear. 

$70/shipped Paypal FF, (G&S w/fees), Venmo, Zelle.
Earliest timestamps on PMs or this thread of "Sold" take precedence.
